title: New: Dâm-Funk – I Don't Run Wit' No Cliques
body:
For a man like **Dâm-Funk**, funk comes naturally, and music comes after.

In these days of people using the word ‘swag’ incessantly, it’s nice to know there are still cool cats about who don’t rely purely on rap music. This kind of West Coast funk is scarce these days, and it does seem **Dâm-Funk** is pulling most of the weight. Drum machine loops and all, the guy could single handedly blow Snoop out of the water whenever he liked. And he made this track just earlier _today_. Check this out, it’ll go down smooth.

_Listen to I Don’t Run Wit’ No Cliques below._
